title: Involuntary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player during a full moon. If you are successful, they will be possessed and appear to still be alive for one day/night cycle.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may control a possessed playerâ€™s votes, whispers and actions. You cannot force them to say anything in a public chat.
- With the Necronomicon, you may attack every night, and possessed players may take two actions per night.
